name: Frog Familiar
description:
Explore a tranquil and mysterious forest while you gather ingredients for a witch's potion.

In this game you play as a little frog who works for a kindly witch. In order for the witch to brew a new potion, you must wander around the forest gathering herbs, mushrooms, and other items. Along the way you will meet a variety of humans, critters, and spirits, some of who could use your help! Can you find all of the items for the potion, including a rare magical crystal?

Frog Familiar takes about an hour to play and is suitable for anyone who wants to have a small adventure in a cute and serene little world.

Features:

  • relaxing gameplay with an emphasis on exploration
  • a variety of side quests and puzzles
  • cute and simple retro-inspired art style
  • 20+ original pieces of chill music
  • 9 costumes to find (plus a hidden secret one)
  • multiple endings based on level of completion
  • no danger or fighting

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move, Shift key to run
  • Enter, Spacebar, or Z to interact
  • Escape or X to open the menu (and to go back/cancel)
  • You can also control the game by clicking around with the mouse

Special Edition & Soundtrack:

Frog Familiar can be played for free, but if you pay $5 or more, you can download the complete 25-track soundtrack, plus a little special edition of the game which comes with four extra costumes: pink bow, witch hat, halo, and sprout.

Please report any bugs to dotmoonbugs at gmail dot com
